idea-plugin.name: Monarcula Theme
idea-plugin.description:
A collection of dark color schemes combining Monokai syntax colors with different base styles. Included themes:
  • Monarcula - Darcula with vibrant Monokai colors
  • Monarcula Soft - Darcula with softer, muted colors
  • Monarcula Island - Island Dark with vibrant Monokai colors
  • Monarcula Island Soft - Island Dark with softer colors
